venue.name: The Thomas E. Golden , Jr. Center

item.description:
Hi, my name's Neil, and I'm a chocoholic.
"Hi Neil!"
Hi everyone. There will be a culinary chocolatier competition at Yale this Saturday afternoon, and you're invited to come judge!
Cost: $10 gets you ten samples, and champagne as well. Details below are from the Connectiuct events calender website:
http://www.visitconne...

See you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008

Valentine Chocolate Festival -- New Haven
January 30, 2010
This will be the most delicious event of the winter. It is a friendly culinary competition of professional and amateur chocolatiers. Event includes a sampling of diverse, delectable chocolate treats and a silent auction of professional entries. Location: Thomas Golden Student Center at St. Thomas More Catholic Chapel at Yale University, 268 Park Street. Time: 1-4:30 p.m. Cost: $10 Donation at the door includes 10 chocolate samples. Champagne will be served too! Information: 203-772-3210
item.name: Dude, Chocolate!
